entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
